title: Didone numeral
content:
Can anyone please tell me exactly what font family the number '2' on the Publico magazine comes from?

Many thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143336im_/http:/typophile.com/files/p2_5700.jpg)
author: NZTrent

comments.content: URW CapellaD or Carousel EF (both fit)
